description: Tough stainless steel-plated ultrahigh speed USB 3.0 4-port hub. The Stanley Global SGT303 employs the latest VIA Labs VL812 Chipset that offers the highest possible speeds combined with low power consumption. Heavy duty 38 inch low-resistance USB cable assures seamless connectivity. Plug N Play with all Windows and Macintosh computers - no external drives required. Built-in over-current protection assures long life and safeguards your valuable peripherals.Great for use with all your external peripheals such as, Ipad, Iphone, Tablets, Android phones or tablets, external drives, and many other USB devices. Does not require any power cords
title: Stanley Global SGT303 Ultraspeed 5Gbps low Powered USB 3.0 - 4 Port Data Hub for use with any USB devices Ipads, iphone, Android, Galaxy s3, printers, External Hard drives etc.
